review: Dr. Anita is an amazing doctor. Alike anyone, I was too scared of the dentist since it was a case of extraction and that too the wisdom molar. But the way doctor managed to complete the surgery is exceptional. She is friendly in nature wherein it becomes easy to speak to the doctor about your problem and in return getting the most appropriate advice. Thank you Dr. Anita

review: *** ***** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** ******* She is my go to dental doctor, she makes me at ease knowing I have anxiety issues, answers all my questions with patience, clearly shares her insight and understanding. Never met a better dentist - her patience and calm composure would make any patient at ease and the remove and fillings have been done with ease. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED IN LAJPAT NAGAR !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
During the treatment, the dentist was very gentle and patient, ensuring that I was comfortable during the treatment. The dentist took the time to explain each step of the procedure to me, which helped alleviate any anxiety I had. I was particularly impressed with the attention to detail and the precision with which the dentist worked.
I highly recommend this dental clinic for their exceptional care, attention to detail, and professionalism. The dental clinic ensures that their patients receive the best possible care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had many questions for i have always been a curious one. And Dr. Anita had the answers to all my questions whether long or short, silly or an even articulated one. The experience is memorable, professional,  and commendable. Usually people have this fear inside whenever they're visiting a clinic for a surgery (minor/major) or treatment. The aura was something else at the clinic for there was no room for fear. The background music (all genres) would keep your fear/fears at bay! All in all, a marvellous experience.

review:
Dr. Anita is a very professional doctor. She is experienced and still very enthusiastic to learn and upgrade her knowledge in the profession. Which is very required as new researches keep happening. 
She is warm and friendly as is always pleasant to visit her. 
She makes her pairents very comfortable which eases the pain before starting the treatment. 

I wish her all the best in life and her profession. 

Regards
Manpreet
